promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic legendary rabbit grass-type pokemon wearing a ancient crown. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Thronhop, a a dynamic legendary rabbit grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Megalo Cannon, Queen's Command-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "grass" or "Thronhop". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, rabbit-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This legendary woodland dweller employs its Megalo Cannon and Queen's Command-GX abilities to maintain peace and harmony in its forest home.
